mapper.select: select user_id as userId, title, description, required_skills as requiredSkills, salary, location, deadline, create_at as createAt, view_count as viewCount, bookmark_count as bookmarkCount, employment_type as employmentType, job_category as jobCategory from job_posts where id=#{recruitId} and deleted_at is null
select company_name as companyName, address, phone_number as phoneNumber, homepage_url as homepageUrl, industry, company_size as companySize from employer_profiles where user_id=#{employerUserId}
